<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4487555cdba30010ea8be9c948961954</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>check if phone is correct when change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var mobile_regex = /\b7(?:[06-8]\d|21|90)\d{6}\b/;
	var phone_number = g_form.getValue('telephone_mobile');
	if(!mobile_regex.test(phone_number)){
		g_form.showErrorBox('telephone_mobile','Numéro incorrect');
	}
	if(!phone_number.match('^[0-9]*$')){
		setTimeout(function(){
			g_form.setValue('telephone_mobile','');
		},1000);
	}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-13 11:00:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f00be499db674010ea8be9c948961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>check if phone is correct when change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f00be499db674010ea8be9c948961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 10:31:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var today = Date.now();
	var date = new Date(newValue);
	if(date>=today){
		g_form.showErrorBox("date_delivrance","la date doit être dans le passé");
		setTimeout(function(){g_form.setValue('date_delivrance','');},3000);
		return;
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-17 10:01:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f62c9aadb674010ea8be9c9489619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Verification de la date de delivrance</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0f62c9aadb674010ea8be9c9489619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 10:09:51</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1fcc0aa0db230010ea8be9c94896190c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Afficher la description de l'offre</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
	if(newValue==1){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_pro',true);
		enordisable(1,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);

	}
	else if(newValue==2){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_office',true);
		enordisable(2,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);

	}
	else if(newValue==3){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_office_intense',true);
		enordisable(3,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);
	}
	else{
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',false);
		enordisable(0,false);
		return;
	}
	
	function enordisable(offre, param){
		g_form.setDisplay('forfait',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('options_supplementaires',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tv_orange',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('bouquet_canalsat',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('access',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('evasion',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tout_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('chaines_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('web_sms',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fixe_mono',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fix_multi',param);
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-11 13:35:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2e0bbaa0dbe30010ea8be9c9489619e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Afficher la description de l'offre</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2e0bbaa0dbe30010ea8be9c9489619e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-18 10:22:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
